question.text: By the time the magazine article on home security devices ___ on the newsstands, the pricing information was already outdated.

answer.explanation: The second clause uses simple past tense so the answer should also use a past tense.

question.text: After December 13 customers will be asked to place their orders online ___ use the mail¬order form.
Bylar Corporate Furnishings is the ___ office-furniture vendor for several of the area’s largest corporations.

answer.explanation:
We are giving more information on the noun "vendor" so we use an adjective.
Perferential = In priority
Preferred = Favourite/Popular

question.text: Science Gadgets, Inc., supports every product it sells ___ and will gladly offer a refund for any purchase a customer is dissatisfied with.
A quarterly survey ___ by Car Trade magazine shows that customers prefer fuel- efficiency over size or price when purchasing a new automobile.

answer.explanation: "Performed" is a shortened version of the relative clause "which was performed".

question.text: Ferrelli Steel has ___ in talks with Montag Fabrics to purchase part of its manufacturing business.

answer.explanation:
Engage in = Take part in = Join in
Engage in talks

question.text: Patent laws guarantee that Halpenn Engineering, Inc., has ___ rights to the technology it developed for robotic surgical devices.

answer.explanation: Exclusive rights = Rights that are only for certain people

question.text: ___ its main competitor, the ergonomic chair offered by Wei! Designs is lightweight and comes in a variety of colors.
Several ___ have been made to the layout of Banham Library’s Web site.
The Parks and Recreation Department is meeting to discuss what ___ the extensive sewer work will have for the outdoor summer concert series in Evergreen Park.

answer.explanation:
The answer is the subject of the question word clause "what" so it is a noun.
Implication = Result
